freebie.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that you are given free, usually by a company
freebie.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A waiter was handing round freebie glasses of wine.
The company paid for the minister to fly out to Australia on a freebie.
freebie.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something that you are given free, for example to encourage you to buy more of the same thing or to buy something else
freebie.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: You get three freebies for every 20 cases of soda purchased.
